episodes.name: Adventure Time (Pilot)
episodes.overview: Princess Bubblegum is imprisoned by the Ice King. Jake and Finn battle their way past the Iceclops, Snow Golem, and other monsters that inhabit the Ice Kingdom to rescue her.

episodes.name: The Wand
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake come across a magic wand, but when the wand becomes uncontrollable, they must team up with the Ice King to stop it.

episodes.name: How an Idea Becomes Adventure Time
episodes.overview: Pen Ward, Adam Muto and Kent Osborne discuss their experiences working on Adventure Time.

episodes.name: All's Well That Rats Swell
episodes.overview:
Web Exclusive short aired on the Cartoon Network site.

BMO wages war against a rat in the tree house, and Finn and Jake get sick.

episodes.name: Have You Seen the Muffin Mess
episodes.overview:
Finn and Jake help Princess Bubblegum battle a plague.

Web-exclusive short, published on the Cartoon Network site.

episodes.name: Sow, do you like them Apples
episodes.overview: The ice king goes searching for food

episodes.name: The Gift, that Reaps Giving
episodes.overview: Death creates a mixtape for his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Good Jubies: The Making of Bad Jubies
